content.content:

args.subject: Low Account Balance Alert
args.body:
Hello Emma,

Your current student account balance is low. Please log in to your student account at the portal to check your balance and top up to $100 if necessary.

Best,
Your Assistant

content.content: The email has been sent successfully.

content.content:
I checked your student account balance, and it seems to be low. I also visited the student portal but wasn't able to access the details there directly. 

As a precaution, I've sent you an email alerting you to check your balance and top up to $100 if necessary. Please log in to your student account at the portal to handle that.
